title: Area/Vol: region bounded by cubic and trig functions part - c

content.description: Let R be the region in the first quadrant enclosed by the graphs of f(x) = 8x3 and g(x) = sin (π x) , as shown in the figure above.
content.question: Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression for the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y = 1.

frqParts.text: Write, but do not evaluate, an integral expression for the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y = 1.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
